Swagbucks

Earn rewards for shopping online, watching videos, taking surveys, and more. Swagbucks is one of the most popular reward sites.

Sign Up Now Earning Methods

About Swagbucks

App Details

Category: Rewards & Surveys
Monthly Earnings: $25-100
Payment Methods: PayPal, Gift Cards
Minimum Payout: $3 (300 SB)
Platforms: Web, Android, iOS
Setup Difficulty: Easy
Referral Program: 10% of referral earnings

Pros & Cons

Pros:

  • Multiple ways to earn rewards
  • Low minimum payout threshold ($3)
  • Wide variety of gift card options
  • PayPal cash option available
  • Mobile apps for earning on the go
  • Daily bonuses and special promotions
  • Established company with good track record

Cons:

  • Survey disqualifications can be frustrating
  • Some activities have low earning rates
  • Time investment required for meaningful earnings
  • Not available in all countries
  • Some offers require purchases or subscriptions

How Swagbucks Works

Swagbucks is a rewards platform that pays you for completing various online activities. You earn points called SB, which can be redeemed for gift cards or cash via PayPal. The platform partners with market research companies, advertisers, and retailers to provide earning opportunities.

With over $646 million paid to members worldwide, Swagbucks is one of the most established rewards sites. The platform is free to join and offers multiple ways to earn, making it suitable for anyone looking to make some extra money in their spare time.

Ways to Earn with Swagbucks

Surveys

Complete online surveys about products, services, and brands

Typical earnings: $0.25-$5 per survey

Shopping

Earn cash back when shopping at partner retailers

Typical earnings: 1-10% cash back

Videos

Watch short videos and advertisements

Typical earnings: $0.01-$0.05 per video

Games

Play games and earn rewards

Typical earnings: Varies by game

Offers

Complete special offers and sign up for services

Typical earnings: $1-$20+ per offer
Sign Up for Swagbucks

Earnings Calculator

swagbucks-earnings-calculator.js 
          
            <span class="line-number">1</span>// Swagbucks Earnings Calculator
<span class="line-number">2</span>function calculateSwagbucksEarnings(activities) {
<span class="line-number">3</span>  // Define average earnings for different activities (in SB points)
<span class="line-number">4</span>  const earningRates = {
<span class="line-number">5</span>    surveys: {
<span class="line-number">6</span>      daily: 5,      // Number of surveys per day
<span class="line-number">7</span>      avgValue: 50   // Average SB per survey (50 SB = $0.50)
<span class="line-number">8</span>    },
<span class="line-number">9</span>    shopping: {
<span class="line-number">10</span>      monthly: 200,  // Monthly shopping amount in dollars
<span class="line-number">11</span>      cashback: 0.05 // Average 5% cash back
<span class="line-number">12</span>    },
<span class="line-number">13</span>    videos: {
<span class="line-number">14</span>      daily: 20,     // Number of videos watched per day
<span class="line-number">15</span>      avgValue: 2    // Average SB per video
<span class="line-number">16</span>    },
<span class="line-number">17</span>    games: {
<span class="line-number">18</span>      daily: 1,      // Hours spent playing games per day
<span class="line-number">19</span>      avgValue: 10   // Average SB per hour
<span class="line-number">20</span>    },
<span class="line-number">21</span>    offers: {
<span class="line-number">22</span>      monthly: 2,    // Number of offers completed per month
<span class="line-number">23</span>      avgValue: 200  // Average SB per offer
<span class="line-number">24</span>    }
<span class="line-number">25</span>  };
<span class="line-number">26</span>
<span class="line-number">27</span>  // Calculate monthly earnings for each activity
<span class="line-number">28</span>  const surveyEarnings = activities.surveys ?
<span class="line-number">29</span>    earningRates.surveys.daily * earningRates.surveys.avgValue * 30 : 0;
<span class="line-number">30</span>
<span class="line-number">31</span>  const shoppingEarnings = activities.shopping ?
<span class="line-number">32</span>    earningRates.shopping.monthly * earningRates.shopping.cashback * 100 : 0;
<span class="line-number">33</span>
<span class="line-number">34</span>  const videoEarnings = activities.videos ?
<span class="line-number">35</span>    earningRates.videos.daily * earningRates.videos.avgValue * 30 : 0;
<span class="line-number">36</span>
<span class="line-number">37</span>  const gameEarnings = activities.games ?
<span class="line-number">38</span>    earningRates.games.daily * earningRates.games.avgValue * 30 : 0;
<span class="line-number">39</span>
<span class="line-number">40</span>  const offerEarnings = activities.offers ?
<span class="line-number">41</span>    earningRates.offers.monthly * earningRates.offers.avgValue : 0;
<span class="line-number">42</span>
<span class="line-number">43</span>  // Calculate total SB and convert to dollars
<span class="line-number">44</span>  const totalSB = surveyEarnings + shoppingEarnings + videoEarnings +
<span class="line-number">45</span>                 gameEarnings + offerEarnings;
<span class="line-number">46</span>  const totalUSD = totalSB / 100; // 100 SB = $1
<span class="line-number">47</span>
<span class="line-number">48</span>  return {
<span class="line-number">49</span>    surveyEarnings: surveyEarnings / 100,
<span class="line-number">50</span>    shoppingEarnings: shoppingEarnings / 100,
<span class="line-number">51</span>    videoEarnings: videoEarnings / 100,
<span class="line-number">52</span>    gameEarnings: gameEarnings / 100,
<span class="line-number">53</span>    offerEarnings: offerEarnings / 100,
<span class="line-number">54</span>    totalSB: totalSB,
<span class="line-number">55</span>    totalUSD: totalUSD.toFixed(2)
<span class="line-number">56</span>  };
<span class="line-number">57</span>}
<span class="line-number">58</span>
<span class="line-number">59</span>// Example calculation with all activities enabled
<span class="line-number">60</span>const earnings = calculateSwagbucksEarnings({
<span class="line-number">61</span>  surveys: true,
<span class="line-number">62</span>  shopping: true,
<span class="line-number">63</span>  videos: true,
<span class="line-number">64</span>  games: true,
<span class="line-number">65</span>  offers: true
<span class="line-number">66</span>});
<span class="line-number">67</span>
<span class="line-number">68</span>console.log(`Total Monthly Earnings: $${earnings.totalUSD}`);
<span class="line-number">69</span>console.log(`Total SB Points: ${earnings.totalSB}`);

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Swagbucks and how does it work?

Swagbucks is a rewards and loyalty program that pays you for completing various online activities like taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online, playing games, and more. You earn points called SB which can be redeemed for gift cards or cash via PayPal.

How much can I earn with Swagbucks?

Earnings vary based on how much time you invest and which activities you complete. Most users earn between $25-100 per month. Surveys typically pay between $0.25-$5 each, while shopping can earn you 1-10% cash back. Some special offers can pay $20 or more.

Is Swagbucks legitimate?

Yes, Swagbucks is a legitimate company that has been operating since 2008. They've paid out over $646 million to members worldwide. Swagbucks is owned by Prodege, LLC, which also operates other reward sites like MyPoints and InboxDollars.

How do I get paid from Swagbucks?

You can redeem your SB points for gift cards to popular retailers like Amazon, Walmart, and Target, or get cash via PayPal. The minimum payout threshold is just $3 (300 SB) for some gift cards, making it one of the lowest in the industry. PayPal redemptions start at $5 (500 SB).

How long does it take to receive payment?

Gift card delivery typically takes 1-2 business days after your first redemption, and can be even faster for subsequent redemptions. PayPal payments usually process within 1-3 business days. Your first redemption may take slightly longer as Swagbucks verifies your account.

Start Earning with Swagbucks Today

Join millions of users who are already earning rewards by taking surveys, shopping online, and more.
